scripts.say: Press forward! Beat them back!
I'll crush you all underfoot! Take this!
Ahahahaha! That's right! Let me see you struggle! Push me to the brink!
I'm not really feeling it, but... I'll do it if I must! Ура!
кролик... Let's wipe them out so we can go home sooner...
Whew! I'm getting a flash of inspiration! Take this!
The concentrated fire of the Northern Parliament quickly swallowed the Siren forces.
Здравствуй, comrade! The name's Kirov! Is this your first time seeing our fleet in action?
If you were surprised by what you saw, don't be shy and just give it to us straight! After all, you're no longer in the Eagle Union, comrade! We'd be glad to listen to anything you have to say!
But before that, let's get you acquainted with everyone here. The one who should do the honors is... the leader of the fleet!
Ah, that is but a formality. Commander, I am Soveskaya Rossiya, leader of the fleet. Pleased to meet you.
Having that said, that title is just provisional in nature. In actuality, we do not observe rank or status in our command structure.
First of all is Kirov. Her participation in this operation will be limited, but I'd at least like you to remember her face.
That's right. We'll get to fight together next time though.
...This is Chapayev. She's mastered her equipment better than any of us have. Also... I'd advise you to not get on her bad side.
I brought my bridle with me just in case. Anyway, let's get along~
Over here is Gangut. She acts hot-blooded and headstrong, but she's actually quite caring.
Hahaha! Comrade, let us fight for the safety of these azure lanes!
This is Tashkent. She was born in Sardegna, but she is one of our irreplaceable friends.
Hmph. I'll show you how strong I really am, dear comrade.
Dear...?
Haha... Don't read too much into it, all right?
This is Grozny. I'd advise you to stay away from her Кроли.
Clo...ri...?
Yes... This is my кроли убийца... It's a cute bunny that kills things...
Finally, this is Minsk. Her imagination can be a bit whimsical, but also helpful at times. Hopefully she can offer you some new insights.
Ehehe, pleased to meet you, Commander!
I assume I don't need to introduce Avrora and Pamiat Merkuria...
So this... is the Northern Parliament...
Before I saw them in action today, I always had been led to believe that they were a collection of peculiar personalities that couldn't hold their own compared to the other major factions.
...But only half of that statement held true. Their abilities were far beyond anything I had expected.
Under the provisions of our joint operation, the fleet of the Northern Parliament is now yours to command, comrade.
That's correct, comrade. This operation is not over yet. I hope you will wield our power effectively.
